short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sperse LinkedIn connector simplifies adding prospective leads and contacts into you CRM with a few simple clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sperse CRM LInkedIn Connector gives you the flexibility to add and manage your contacts from any web page. You can use the convenient LinkedIn lead sync feature to update your contacts in your CRM.
